Run the Shiny Application

Source: R/cdwtools.R
cdwtools.Rd

Runs the cdwtools Shiny Application.
Use language argument to choose language to use ("EN" or "FR" available).
Use options to set options to shiny::shinyApp() function, see documentation of shiny::shinyApp for more informations.

To connect to distant database, use db_info argument. db_info is a list, containing these parameters :

  • sql_lib : SQL library used, "postgres" or "sqlite" available for now

  • dbname : database name (character)

  • host : host connection name (character)

  • port : connection port (integer)

  • user : user name (character)

  • password : password in clear (character)

cdwtools(
  language = "EN",
  db_info = list(),
  default_folder = character(),
  options = list(),
  ...
)

Arguments

language

Default language to use in the App (character)
db_info

Database connection informations, if it is needed to connect a distant db (list).
default_folder

Default folder where to save datamarts CSV files (character)
options

A list of options that could be passed to shiny::shinyApp() function (list)
...

arguments to pass to golem_opts.
